subtitle.Text: Karla: Oh man, this thing. Steve: So two things: One, mom's Canadian! Karla: Yay!

Steve: Two: Mom didn't start out Canadian! The reason that mom is Canadian is because Kate Craig and Emily Carroll are Canadian, and early on in the development of the game, Emily did mom's handwriting.
Karla: This is before she did any of the UI text or anything.
Steve: Right, and it was before we decided that all the moms were going to actually be written by moms, and all that kind of stuff.
Steve: And so we had the answering machine note in the foyer, and... what's the actual line that's there? It was like...
Karla: Neighborhood. Steve: Right, yeah. So the line on the thing is like, "Daniel from the old neighborhood called. Call him back."
And we gave the text to Emily, and she wrote it out longhand and gave it back to us, and I looked at it and realized she had inserted a U into the word neighborhood...
Karla: 'Cause that's what you do, in Canada. Steve: ...because of being Canadian. And so to fix that bug, instead of removing the U, I said, "Bug fixed. Mom is now Canadian."
